title: @The Rioter who made Final Boss Veigar

replies.body: One of our VFX artists, Brian, loved Veigar as a champion, and Final Boss Veigar was actually his baby while it was in development. He did take some inspiration from FF VI, as well as a ton of other game references. ^-^

Please let Brian know his efforts, along with the team responsible for its creation, have produced the epitome of legendary skins and the numerous references to classic (and contemporary games) have not gone unnoticed, would you kindly?
For final boss blitzcrank, was his inspiration from mega man?

:D sweet. Also All I could think of when I saw veigar's hand was Master Hand from Super Smash Bro's Brawl. I was dissapointed that his W wasn't turned into a palm slap from Master hand :(. Woulda been hilarious to see just a hand plummeting from the heavens and giving graves a massive palm slap.
I totally thought that too. Megaman X2?

Yes it is taken from Kefka. Even his quote: "I will make a monument to non-existence!" is said by Kefka. Enjoy the sheer amounts of video game references in Final Boss {{champion:45}} ! "It's over 9000!" Another quote from the skin's VO!
